comments.body: I thought about it, but then I ended up doing more filesystem operations overall.

This is coming from the dart VM. It wouldn't happen if the entrypoint wasn't under `lib/`.

We might want to file a request to allow us to silence this or something.
cc @jakemac53 - I wonder if we should suppress this line ourselves if the `--skip-build-script-check` flag is used?
Ya, that seems like it would make sense.
I thought this was a non-goal? Given that it is shipped with the sdk and we invalidate the build if the SDK version changes.
Oops, this isn't correct for windows
